detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ERH (contractSource/TSE/0x2c1180e2818069e5a9f911e636fb8f3db5106a9f.sol#69-89) has payable functions:
	 - ERH.fallback() (contractSource/TSE/0x2c1180e2818069e5a9f911e636fb8f3db5106a9f.sol#85-87)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
